comments:
AK (9/19/2001 7:26:41 PM)
	(i guess it has to do with the duplicate type name B)

	0. turn autobuild on
	1. create a package df
	2. create B.java and a public class B in it
	3. create A.java and a public class A in it
	4. open A.java in the editor
	5. select the whole source of A and paste the following code _over it_

package p;
class A{}
class B{}

	6. now, without saving, put the correct package declaration (i.e. package df; instead of package p;)
	7. save
